page.title: 18Horticulture
page.content: Most of the{horticulture}in the Bredon area is done around{Kinsham}.They grow {lettuces,cabbages,tomatoes,vegetables, {etc}.Market gardening produce is sold to shops & local markets. { Westmancote Nurseries have 10 {greenhouses}covering 2 acres. They are 50 years old & are worth Â£80,000.The potting machine costing Â£6000 fills pots with soil.They employ 18 people, 5 of them men.They grow{pot plants and {indoor & bedding plants}in plastic tunnel covering 0.5 acre .Every year they grow{662,000 plants}. Most are sold but there is 10% wastage.They sell to markets all over the{U.K. and some go to{Holland & Belgium}.The greenhouses are oil-fired hot-air heated.They are soon due to be replaced with modern computer controlled houses.
